attributes.action: Stop allowing criminals to have a better life than innocent people.
attributes.background: A study has suggested that criminals be allowed Skype and/or social media in prison.  There are people who've never done anything wrong in their life and struggle to afford basic internet service and mobile phones and now our taxes are going to find them to have a more cushy life? It's not right.

rejection.details: If you would like the Government to reduce the level of amenities available to serving prisoners in all prison categories, you could start a petition about that.
